resources.string: CheckYourEnglishProficiency
Hello blank fragment
Question: I _____ English, and my brother _____ German.
Correct Answer: study/studies
Question: Give us a call when you’re in town! We’re looking forward _______ you!
Correct Answer: to meeting
Question: He usually ______ coffee, but right now he _______ tea.
Correct Answer: drinks / is drinking
Question: ________ spend the whole weekend with my cousins.
Correct Answer: I am going to
Question: I _____ tired of my old phone and _____ to buy a new one.
Correct Answer: got / decided
Question: I used to ____ to work at 7a.m., so I’m used to ______ up early.
Correct Answer: go/getting
Question: I’m sorry I didn’t pick up the phone. I was ______ a shower.
Correct Answer: taking
Question: Wine is usually ____ than beer, and it’s also ______.
Correct Answer: stronger / more expensive
Question: Jupiter is the _____ planet in our solar system. I also think it’s the _____.
Correct Answer: largest / most beautiful
Question: Be patient! _________ cooking dinner yet!
Correct Answer: I haven’t finished
